name: Politoed
description: The Frog Pokémon. The longer and more luxurious the curled hair on its head, the greater the number of Poliwag and Poliwhirl that will obey it.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by Self Destruct and Explosion moves.

abilities.name: Drizzle
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters an outside battle, the weather immediately changes to light rain for 5 rounds. In the case of another Pokémon with a similar weather ability, the tie goes to the Pokémon with the highest DEX score.
